sub_title: Trade Finance Director | Executive MSc in International Finance (Candidate)
summary: Based in Amsterdam, covering trade finance for Axendo and in touch base with banks, credit risk insurance companies as well as clients. Former corporate and investment banker with a background in a client facing position covering debt products in Garantibank International, HSBC and Is Investment.
